text: Drama in Moscow () is a 1909 Russian silent drama movie directed by Vasili Goncharov.Драма в МосквеДРАМА В МОСКВЕ It stars Pyotr Chardynin and Aleksandra Goncharova. == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Russian drama movies Category:Russian silent movies Category:1909 drama movies Category:Movies directed by Vasili Goncharov
title: Drama in Moscow
